articles.title: Kim Jong Un Goes Round Process for Production of Acrylic Paints Newly Built at Sunchon Chemical Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Goes Round Process for Production of Acrylic Paints Newly Built at Sunchon Chemical Complex
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Committee of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Sunchon Chemical Complex and looked round the newly built process for the production of acrylic paints.
					 Going round the acrylic acid synthesizing and rectifying processes, processes for the production of distemper paints and oil paints and other places, he expressed great satisfaction over the successful construction of the world-level acrylic paints process. 
					
					 He said it is very laudable that the process was established in Korean style and its equipment were designed and manufactured by the indigenous efforts. He was pleased to see the mass production of not only paints of diverse colors for exterior and interior walls as well as metals and wood but also Terracottem, substance for ameliorating soil and supplementing moisture, he added.
					
					 Noting that by putting the production of acrylic paints on a normal footing it has become possible to supply quality paints to different fields of national economy, he sent thanks to the officials, scientists, technicians and workers of the Ministry of Chemical Industry, the Sunchon Chemical Complex, the Namhung Chemical Designing Institute and Kim Chaek University of Technology in the name of the Party Central Committee for their big contribution to the building of the precious production process.
					
					 Underscoring the need to direct sustained big efforts to developing the chemical industry on the basis of the success achieved, he specified tasks and ways for putting the production of chemical goods on Juche-basis at a high level.
					
					 At present when the imperialists are becoming ever more undisguised in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK as they do not wish to see us be well-off and thrive, we can count only on our own efforts and nobody is willing to help us, he said, noting that if one believes in one's own strength, even a thousand miles looks very short but even a mile looks a very long distance if one believes in other's efforts and only when we display the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, can we achieve the greatest success even under the worst conditions and vigorously advance our revolution.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and workers of the Complex would dynamically take the lead in the drive for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Premier Pak Pong Ju and Ri Mu Yong, vice-premier and minister of Chemical Industry.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Regime's Moves to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Struggle against Park Geun Hye Regime's Moves to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea recently called to Chongwadae lawmakers of Taegu and North Kyongsang Province origin and told them that "if Songju County recommends another site for THAAD, she would examine whether there is a suitable place, instead of the site in the county."
					 As those of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Defense plunged into a confusion by Park's remarks about "examination of the third place" were busy "confirming" them and even her master U.S. blustered that it would not agree on the third place, Park is finding herself in an awkward position.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement on Saturday says in this regard:
					
					 What traitor Park uttered this time is, as commented by the public at home and abroad, little short of her self-acknowledgment of THAAD's critical impact on human health and surrounding environment and serious catastrophic consequences to be entailed by it across south Korea.
					
					 There is a saying that an intended crime deserves severer punishment than the crime committed, unaware of it. Traitor Park has left no means untried to introduce THAAD into south Korea by deceiving the public at any cost though she knows that it is good for nothing. Lurking behind this is her ill-minded intention to make all Koreans fall victim to the U.S. policy of aggression.
					
					 THAAD is not for protecting the lives of the south Korean people but for shielding the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces present in south Korea and a source of trouble that will only serve the purpose of the U.S. policy of seeking to dominate the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia. This fact can by no means be covered up.
					
					 Park would be sadly mistaken if she calculates she can calm down the enraged public including the inhabitants of Songju County with the above-said rhetoric. She cannot but be called a wicked traitor without an equal.
					
					 The only solution to the controversial issue of THAAD lies in scrapping the decision to deploy THAAD bringing a nuclear disaster to the south Korean people and in resolutely eliminating the group of traitors that created such danger on behalf of all Koreans, not in "examining the third place."
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad desirous of peace against war will have to stage a more dynamic struggle to foil the reckless moves of the Park group to deploy THAAD, the thrice-cursed crime challenging the nation and history.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Foreign Ministry Back Home
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK led by Vice-Minister Sin Hong Chol returned home Saturday after visiting some African countries.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Orthodox Church led by Antonii, chief for Administration of its Overseas Organs, arrived here on Friday to attend the ceremony marking the 10th anniversary of the Jongbaek Church.

articles.title: Official of British Labor Party Here
articles.content:
Official of British Labor Party Here
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Glyn Ford, member of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the British Labor Party, and his companion arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday on the 71st anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They laid a bouquet before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong that day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet in Chongjin
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet in Chongjin
 Chongjin, August 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Chongjin Port on Saturday with the approach of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Attending it were the captain and crewmen of the Togo-flagged ship YUYUAN.
					
					 Speakers said that the President pledged himself in his teens not to return home unless Korea is liberated and won the great victory in the struggle for liberation of the country and the nation by waging the 20 year-long armed struggle in the cold-wind-swept dense forests of Mt. Paektu, overcoming all sorts of hardships.
					
					 They noted that the President left his footprints on every range of Mt. Paektu and at every bend of the River Amnok when making long journeys for bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 They said Marshal Kim Jong Un is glorifying forever the exploits performed by the preceding leaders for the national liberation and their Songun revolutionary leadership exploits and leading the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. to victory.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Tradition of Literature and Art Created during Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
articles.content:
Tradition of Literature and Art Created during Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Eighty years has passed since the revolutionary drama "The Sea of Blood" was premiered at Manjiang, China during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 The drama holds an important place among masterpieces created by President Kim Il Sung during the struggle.
					
					 It discloses the massacre the Japanese imperialists committed against the Korean people and shows how the heroine was gradually awakened to come out in the revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 At that time, the drama inspired the popular masses to the anti-Japanese struggle with extreme influence and appeal.
					
					 Looking back upon that time, President Kim Il Sung wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century" as follows:
					
					 "The ideas and emotions of the revolutionary army flowed, like the stream of Manjiang, into the brains, hearts and lungs of the people through the performance of The Sea of Blood. 
					
					 I can say, in short, that the art of the period of the anti-Japanese revolution acted as a light, which dispelled darkness as well as drum beats, rousing people to fight."
					
					 Regarding it as his constant view that a single excellent poem, drama and novel can stir up the hearts of all people, the President created many masterpieces like revolutionary dramas "The Mountain Shrine" and "A Letter from a Daughter" and "Song of Anti-Japanese War" to imbue guerrillas and people with enmity against the Japanese imperialists and ardent patriotism.
					
					 Based on the tradition of literature and art created during the bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle, leader Kim Jong Il ushered in a great heyday of Juche-oriented literary and artistic development.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, a revolutionary drama "The Sea of Blood" was adapted for a revolutionary film in Juche 58(1969), for a revolutionary opera in 1971 and for a revolutionary novel in 1973 and a number of "The Sea of Blood"-type revolutionary operas had been produced.
					
					 Thanks to the brilliant tradition of literature and art created in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the Juche-oriented literature and art highly prove their vitality in the grandiose struggle for building a socialist power.

articles.title: Nature Museum in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Nature Museum in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Thousands of people visit the Nature Museum newly built at the foot of Mt. Taesong in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, on a daily average.
					 The four-storied museum, another gift provided by the Workers' Party of Korea to the people, is a modern mass educational and science research and dissemination base and leisure complex.
					
					 Hanging on its front wall is a mark depicting dinosaur. The museum houses at least 31,000 exhibits of over 3,800 kinds to show all levels of the evolutionary ladder in a visual, 3D and panoramic way.
					
					 On its first floor are atrium, where model frameworks of three dinosaurs and model pterosaurs representing the Mesozoic age are exhibited, the Space Hall, Paleozoic Hall and Dinosaur Park through which visitors can get broad knowledge about solar system and the earth in correlation with the origin of life.
					
					 Seen on the second and third floors are the Animal Hall and Plant Hall.
					
					 The Animal Hall is divided into four areas--animal classification area, animal ecology area, animal-human life area and animal diversity protection area. 
					
					 Exhibited at the Plant Hall are typical plants and natural monuments of Korea and other countries.
					
					 There are a sci-tech disseminating room, e-library, rooms for research into animals, plants and extinct organisms, etc. on the fourth floor.

articles.title: DPRK-Made Beers Enjoying Popularity
articles.content:
DPRK-Made Beers Enjoying Popularity
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Beers produced by different factories in the DPRK are enjoying great popularity at home and abroad.
					 The most popular one is the Taedonggang beer which is highly topical among world press media.
					
					 The Voice of America (VOA) said that the Taedonggang beer is appreciated as the best among those produced in Northeast Asia and even some Western media highly appraised its flavor.
					
					 The British "Economist" and Reuters reported that the Taedonggang beer is excellent in its flavor.
					
					 The south Korean "Yonhap News" stressed that the reputation of the Taedonggang beer is attributable to the scientific and perfect quality control ranging from procurement of raw materials to finishing.
					
					 ITAR-TASS, the Chinese Huan Qiu Shibao, the China News Service and other media reported that the Taedonggang beer is getting popular for its high quality, it is as excellent as world famous beers and even foreign tourists eulogize it as "very fine and excellent beer" and "the best beer in the East".
					
					 An American beer fan, when visiting Pyongyang, said that even the best-selling beer in different countries of Asia is far behind the Taedonggang beer and he is itching to keep drinking the Taedonggang beer.
					
					 Now, the Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Fest is going on in the DPRK, which would be a significant occasion in providing the people with a happy life.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for Liberating Country Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed for Liberating Country Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, was interviewed by KCNA on Saturday on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Jo said that Aug. 15 is a historic day when the destiny of the country and compatriots was saved from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and a fresh chapter of national prosperity was opened.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Today when the nation of the sun is demonstrating its dignity and honor far and wide, all compatriots are keenly realizing what great exploits President Kim Il Sung, benefactor of national resurrection and peerless patriot, performed by liberating the country.
					
					 Looking back upon history, the Korean nation's sovereignty and three thousand-ri land were usurped and were in the danger of losing their mother tongue and their own names by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Koreans lamented over the ruined country, stood against the Japanese imperialists through the March First Popular Uprising and waged a volunteers' struggle and petitioned for independence but they were only subject to the invaders' brutal crackdown and cold-shouldered by big powers.
					
					 It was none other than the great President Kim Il Sung who declared an all-out war against the Japanese imperialists with the great intention to liberate the country at the time of national sufferings.
					
					 He made long journeys for bloody battles against the Japanese imperialists while undergoing all sorts of hardships for several decades since he got out of the brushwood gate of his house in Mangyongdae in his teens with his solemn resolution not to come back home unless Korea is liberated.
					
					 But for the leadership of Kim Il Sung the Korean nation would not have been able to escape the destiny as the miserable slaves deprived of its bloodline, language, history and culture. 
					
					 He was, indeed, the benefactor of the national resurrection and founding father of socialist Korea.
					
					 His glorious history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and immortal exploits performed by him for liberating the country will last forever.

articles.title: Preemptive Nuclear Strike Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Preemptive Nuclear Strike Is Not Monopoly of U.S.: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. attempt to invade the DPRK is getting evermore reckless.
					 While ceaselessly shipping nuclear strategic assets into the Korean peninsula, it forward-deployed four B-1Bs and three B-2As on Guam on Aug. 6 and 9. So, three missions of the U.S. strategic bombers including B-52, B-1B and B-2A have been deployed simultaneously for the first time.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers blustered that their forward-deployment of B-1Bs on Guam would enable them to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK through a surprise flying over the Korean peninsula only in two hours.
					
					 Moreover, they unhesitatingly let loose a spate of provocative remarks that the nuclear strategic bombers' forward-deployment implies the "advance warning" against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. evermore undisguised reinforcement of the nuclear force goes to clearly prove that it is trying to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK a fait accompli.
					
					 Guam, the U.S. strategic vantage point capable of supporting strategic weapons to the Korean peninsula and the Northeast Asian region in a few hours in contingency, is an advanced base for invading the DPRK and now it has the THAAD battery to be deployed in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forward-deployed B-1Bs and B-2As one after another on Guam, where it used to permanently station only B-52Hs so far, after it decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea. It is part of its scenario to invade the DPRK to put the DPRK under its militarily control at any cost through mobilization of all its lethal hardware for a nuclear war.
					
					 The hard reality in which the Korean peninsula is turning into a nuclear war theatre by the U.S. eloquently shows how impudent the U.S.-touted "denuclearization" and "world without nuclear weapons" are.
					
					 Just indeed are the DPRK's measures for bolstering up its nuclear weapons to cope with the U.S. and its followers' reckless rackets for nuclear threats.
					
					 Today the DPRK which emerged as a nuclear weapons state in the East is pressing the U.S. with its powerful military muscle.
					
					 The right to make a preemptive nuclear strike is not the monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces switched from their existing mode of military counter-action to the mode of a preemptive strike to cope with the enemy's ridiculous military hysteria to undermine its sovereignty and right to existence. All their operational groups are fully ready to deal a merciless and annihilating blow to the enemy if they make even the slightest provocation.
					
					 The Korean People's Army is closely following the U.S. unusual military move.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop acting rashly.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Repeal of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Repeal of Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Taejon citizens of south Korea held a Wednesday rally on Aug. 10 in demand of a right solution to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to Tongil News of south Korea.
					 Even children know that Japan's sincere apology to victims of the sexual slavery is a key to the solution to the issue of sexual slavery but the south Korean regime and the Japanese government are ignorant of it, speakers noted, adding:
					
					 Though Japan failed to make an apology and victims didn't pardon it, the regime concluded a humiliating "agreement" with Japan and established the "reconciliation and recovery fund."
					
					 The speakers queried for whom such "agreement" and "fund" are necessary.
					
					 They demanded the scrapping of the "agreement" and dissolution of the "fund."
					
					 We will struggle and defend the girl statue until Japan makes an official acknowledgement and apology for the sexual slavery, they added.

articles.title: U.S. Denounced for Its Persistent Moves for THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
U.S. Denounced for Its Persistent Moves for THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean measure committee against THAAD deployment held a news conference11 in Seoul on August in protest against the south Korea visit by the director of the Missile Defense Agency of the U.S. Department of Defense.
					 The organization in a press release said the south Korea visit by the director shows how desperately the U.S. tries to calm down the strong opposition of the south Korean people and deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 It recalled that the director said THAAD is not efficient for defending south Korea but it is to protect the U.S. mainland.
					
					 It strongly denounced the U.S. for working hard to deploy THAAD in south Korea despite opposition of the south Korean people.
					
					 The struggle of the Songju County people represents the stand of all the south Korean people opposing THAAD deployment, the press release noted, demanding the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once the moves for THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Internet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Polish Internet
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on Aug. 9.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification.
					
					 The work formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and indicates the tasks for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and the ways to do so on the basis of them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory Lauded by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for War Victory Lauded by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on August 6 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, iron-willed commander and peerless strategist, liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' brutal colonial rule on August 15, 1945.
					
					 He wisely led the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Korea could be liberated as peerless patriot Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and led it to victory.
					
					 Korea's liberation was a noteworthy event in the Korean nation's history spanning five thousand years.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is the benefactor of the Korean nation's liberation and a legendary hero.
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK and socialist system of Juche are based on the liberation of the country.
					
					 Korea's liberation greatly encouraged the world people struggling for freedom and independence.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Held in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A Korean film show was held by a company of Nigeria on August 3 on the occasion of the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 The director and employees of the company watched the Korean film "Sci-Tech Complex" and praised Marshal Kim Jong Un for having defended and preserved the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by successfully solving the youth issue, and developed them on a new high stage.
					
					 They expressed hope that the young Korean people would work bigger miracles in building a powerful socialist country and thus splendidly greet the Ninth Conference of the youth league.

articles.title: Mauritanian Internet Paper Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort
articles.content:
Mauritanian Internet Paper Introduces Masikryong Ski Resort
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- An internet paper of Mauritania posted an article titled "Masikryong Ski Resort of the DPRK" on August 8.
					 The Masikryong Ski Resort was built in the DPRK at the highest level a few years ago, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The resort is equipped with all facilities for skiing.
					
					 Masikryong area is well known for winter ski tourism and draws many tourists even in summer for its clean natural environment and beautiful scenery.
					
					 Men and women, old and young, visit the resort every day for their pleasant rest.
					
					 Masikryong Hotel has a swimming pool, entertainment hall, restaurant, shop, etc. and the visitors are unwilling to leave it.
					
					 The ski resort built under the meticulous care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un is of great pleasure to the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre el proceso productivo de pintura acrilica de Complejo Quimico de Sunchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre el proceso productivo de pintura acrilica de Complejo Quimico de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el proceso de produccion de pintura acrilica, nuevamente acondicionada en el Complejo Quimico de Sunchon.
					Recorriendo el proceso de sintesis y refinacion de acido acrilico, el de produccion de pintura al agua, la de produccion de pintura grasa, etc., mostro gran satisfaccion por haber acondicionado excelentemente la cadena de produccion de pintura acrilica.
					
					Son muy excelentes los procesos productivos de la pintura acrilica preparados a nuestro estilo y las instalaciones disenadas con las fuerzas propias, evaluo el Presidente y dijo que esta muy contento al ver que se producen en gran cantidad no solo las pinturas de distintos colores para las partes externas e internas de las paredes de los edificios, los metales y las maderas, sino tambien Terracottem, sustancia para el mejoramiento de la tierra y anadidura de agua.
					
					Gracias a la normalizacion de la produccion de pintura acrilica, se permite suministrar las pinturas de buena calidad a varios dominios de la economia nacional, senalo y dio agradecimiento en nombre del Comite Central del PTC a los funcionarios, los cientificos, los tecnicos y los obreros del Ministerio de Industria Quimica, el Complejo Quimico de Sunchon, el Instituto de Diseno Quimico de Namhung y la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, quienes hicieron gran contribucion a la construccion de la fabrica importante.
					
					Tienen que seguir prestando la mayor atencion al desarrollo de la industria quimica a base de los exitos ya alcanzados, dijo e ilumino las tareas y los remedios concretos para perfeccionar en el nivel alto la jucheanizacion de la produccion de los articulos quimicos.
					
					Hoy dia, cuando se recrudecen aun mas las siniestras maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento de los imperialistas que no desean la vida feliz y prosperidad del pueblo coreano, debemos creer solo en nuestras propias fuerzas y nadie quiere ayudarnos, subrayo. Si confiamos en las fuerzas propias se reducira el camino largo y en el caso contrario se alargara el camino corto, dijo y continuo que solo cuando desplegamos el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza, podremos lograr los maximos exitos en las condiciones peores y llevar adelante con dinamismo nuestra revolucion.
					
					Mostro la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los obreros del Complejo estaran al frente de la lucha para materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el premier Pak Pong Ju y Ri Mu Yong, vicepremier y ministro de Industria Quimica.

articles.title: CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra despliegue de THAAD
articles.content:
CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra despliegue de THAAD
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Park Geun-hye se reunio en Chongwadae con los "parlamentarios" procedentes de Taegu y la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte.
					Al referirse en esa ocasion al sitio de ubicacion de THAAD, ella dijo que "si hay una zona que proponga el distrito de Songju, examinaria si existe otro lugar adecuado que no sea precisamente la bateria del monte Song de ese distrito".
					
					Por otra parte, los tipejos del Ministerio de Defensa del Sur de Corea estan sudando gotas gordas para "aclarar" el chisme de Park sobre el "examen de un tercer lugar".
					
					Lo que pone mas incomoda a la traidora es la amenaza de su amo gringo de que no permitiria el tercer lugar para emplazar el THAAD. 
					
					Al respecto, el vocero del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) publico el dia 13 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Como evaluan unanimemente los coreanos y los extranjeros, tal chisme significa que ella misma reconocio la nocividad fatal de THAAD para el cuerpo humano y el medioambiente y sus consecuencias destructivas que recaerian en todo el territorio surcoreano.
					
					A sabiendas de que es completamente inutil el THAAD, Park Geun-hye trata de desplegarlo a toda costa en el suelo surcoreano enganando a la opinion publica con el siniestro objetivo de convertir la poblacion surcoreana y toda la nacion en las victimas de la politica agresiva de EE.UU. 
					
					No se puede ocultar de ninguna manera que el THAAD no es para la vida de los habitantes surcoreanos, sino para la proteccion de las tropas yanquis ocupantes del territorio surcoreano y constituye la fuente de desgracias en funcion de la politica agresiva de Estados Unidos que persigue tomar la hegemonia en la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico.    
					
					El THAAD, que amenaza gravemente la vida de los habitantes surcoreanos y el destino de todos los coreanos y perturba la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico, sera siempre la causa de desastres y desgracias sea cual fuera el lugar de su ubicacion en suelo surcoreano.
					
					 Si la incapaz mandataria surcoreana hubiera pensado que puede calmar la indignada opinion publica del Sur de Corea, incluyendo la de los habitantes del distrito de Songju, con el truco barato de "examinar un tercer lugar", no habria tenido otro resultado que ganarse el apodo de traidora mas imbecil.
					
					 La unica solucion del incidente de THAAD no esta en "examinar un tercer lugar" sino en invalidar la resolucion de emplazamiento de THAAD de caracter agresivo, que impondra desastres nucleares al pueblo surcoreano, y sepultar rotundamente en nombre de la nacion a los traidores surcoreanos que causaron este problema.
					
					  Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, que rechazan la guerra y desean la paz, deben dinamizar la lucha por frustrar las tentativas de ubicacion de THAAD de la banda de Park que comete mas crimenes de traicion desafiando a la nacion y la historia.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang Glyn Ford y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang Glyn Ford y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 13 a esta capital Glyn Ford, miembro del Comite de Relaciones Exteriores del Partido Laborista Britanico, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Golpe preventivo nuclear no es monopolio de EE.UU.: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Golpe preventivo nuclear no es monopolio de EE.UU.: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se torna cada dia mas imprudente el intento de Estados Unidos de agredir a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Al paralelo de la introduccion sucesiva de sus propiedades estrategicas nucleares en la Peninsula Coreana, emplazo el 6 de agosto 4 bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B en la isla Guam y el dia 9, 3 unidades de B-2A.
					
					 Los belicistas estadounidenses dicen que el avance de B-1B a la isla Guam les permite dar el golpe preventivo nuclear a la RPDC dentro de 2 horas de vuelo sorpresivo al cielo de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Para colmo, disparatean que el despliegue avanzado de los bombarderos estrategicos implica la "advertencia previa" a la RPDC.
					
					  El aumento armamentista nuclear de EE.UU. comprueba que este pais considera como hecho consumado el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					  La isla Guam es el punto estrategico de EE.UU. que puede enviar en unas horas las armas estrategicas a la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico en el tiempo de emergencia y la base avanzada para la agresion a la RPDC donde hay una bateria de THAAD a punto de trasladarse al Sur de Corea.
					
					  Despues de tomar la decision de ubicar THAAD en el Sur de Corea, EE.UU. emplazo B-1B y B-2A en esa isla donde se encontraban con caracter permanente solo los B-52H, lo cual parte del intento de ocupar militarmente a la RPDC movilizando todos los pertrechos de guerra nuclear.
					
					  La realidad deplorable de la Peninsula Coreana, convertida en el escenario de guerra nuclear por culpa de EE.UU., desenmascara el caracter cinico de sus sofismas como "desnuclearizacion" y "mundo libre de armas nucleares".
					
					  Son muy justas las medidas para desarrollar en alto nivel las armas nucleares, tomadas por la RPDC frente a la imprudente amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					  Hoy dia, la RPDC, potencia nuclear del Oriente, presiona a EE.UU. con sus poderosas fuerzas militares.
					
					  El derecho al ataque preventivo nuclear no es un monopolio de EE.UU.
					
					  Frente al ridiculo intento de los enemigos de acabar con nuestra soberania y derecho a la existencia, todos los colectivos operacionales de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias cambiaron ya su modo de reaccion militar por el de ataque preventivo y entraron en la disposicion de asestar un ataque demoledor a los agresores.
					
					  El Ejercito Popular de Corea observa con aguda vigilancia los sospechosos movimientos militares de EE.UU. 
					
					  EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia.
